item.description:
We've covered northern Italy and discovered some great white wines, now let's head south and see what the rest of the country has to offer.  Our first stop is a little vague since central Italy is perhaps best known for its red wines.  However, Noelle may have found something interesting on her recent trip to Italy so let's get together and see what Central Italy has to tantalize our taste buds.

Appetizers welcome--please email me if you'd like to bring something.

group.name: The MetroWest White Wine Meetup Group

item.name: Giro d'Italia leg #5: Central Italy
